title: U.S. household expenditure on hair care products 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and lastly gradually increasing from 2013 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 89.95 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 61.69 was reported at Year 2012
